Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
It was great speaking with you earlier today.
I wanted to share some links you may find useful to help ensure your family stays protected:
Living Will: Specify medical instructions
Power of Attorney: Appoint someone to make financial decisions on your behalf
Legal Advice from an Attorney: Have an attorney review your estate plan
Living Trust: Avoid probate-related expenses and delay
Real Estate Deed Transfer: Add or remove a person’s name from your property title or place your property in a living trust.
Again, thank you for your time today, and don’t hesitate to reach out if you have any questions.
Best regards,
